Vinyasa Flow
Vinyasa classes keep you moving, linking breath with sequences of sun salutes and other postures creating a beautifully sweaty yoga experience.

About instructor

Why I teach
I love to learn. My students have taught me more about life than any teacher or textbook ever could. Through teaching I hope to inspire others to open themselves to the lessons that life has to offer.
